subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text: {{Han simp|從|f=从|t=䒑}}. Based on the character found in the Chinese orthographic dictionary {{w|Ganlu Zishu}} ({{w2|ja|干祿字書}})<!-- Refer http://dict.variants.moe.edu.tw/variants/rbt/word_attribute.rbt?quote_code=QTAxMjkzLTAwMw#18 --> and adopted as a {{w|shinjitai}} form in the 1946 {{w|Tōyō kanji}} list.

subSections.title: Readings
subSections.text:
{{ja-readings
|goon=しゅ, じゅ, じゅう
|kanon=しょう
|kanyoon=じゅう
|kun=したが-う, したが-える, より
|nanori=つぐ
}}

subSections.title: Compounds
